dimensions:
Warp x Weft: 50 x 41.5 cm (19 11/16 x 16 5/16 in.)
Repeat H x W: 39.4 x 25.4 cm (15 1/2 x 10 in.)
title: Chintz
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation. Mordants for black, reds and purples applied by pen and brush. Madder dyed.  Blue applied over resist by brush.  Yellow applied by brush (chintz).
description: Groups of flowers on diagonally moving stems.
name: Chintz
